mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (MOVI_ID, USER_ID, RATING, COMMENTS) VALUES (#{movi_id},#{user_id},#{rating},#{comments})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RATING = #{rating}, COMMENTS = #{comments} WHERE MOVI_ID = #{movi_id} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE REVIEW WHERE MOVI_ID = #{movi_id} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT R.COMMENTS, R.RATING, M.MOVI_ID, M.MOVI_NAME, M.IMAGE FROM MOVIE M LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON R.MOVI_ID = M.MOVI_ID WHERE M.MOVI_ID IN (SELECT MOVI_ID FROM SHOWSCHEDULE WHERE SHOW_ID IN (SELECT SHOW_ID FROM BOOK WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}) AND CONCAT(SHOW_DATE,SHOW_TIME) <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, ('YYYYMMDDHHMM')))
